meanings.sent1: The patient preferred to remain unmedicated for their condition.
meanings.sent2: She chose to go unmedicated for her headache and tried natural remedies instead.
meanings.sent3: The unmedicated approach to his cold involved lots of rest and herbal tea.
meanings.sent4: Her unmedicated state allowed her body to heal naturally.
meanings.sent5: The unmedicated treatment focused on holistic healing methods.

meanings.definition: Not under the influence of medication.
meanings.sent1: He wanted to drive unmedicated to avoid any side effects.
meanings.sent2: She felt more like herself when she was unmedicated.
meanings.sent3: The unmedicated patient joked about being the only clear-headed one in the room.
meanings.sent4: His unmedicated state gave him a sense of clarity he hadn't felt in a while.
meanings.sent5: Being unmedicated allowed her to experience life without any interference.
